original_title: Joy Division: Here Are the Young Men
overview: 1. Decades 2. Dead Souls 3. Love Will Tear Us Apart 4. Shadowplay 5. Day Of The Lords 6. Digital 7. Colony 8. New Dawn Fades 9. Autosuggestion 10. Transmission 11. Sound Of Music 12. She's Lost Control 13. Walked In Line 14. I Remember Nothing 15. Love Will Tear Us Apart  1 hour half inch tape from Ikon FCL. All songs published by Fractured Music  Live footage (albeit poor quality) from the Apollo in Manchester and Eindhoven, The Netherlands.
title: Joy Division: Here Are the Young Men
